input.sentences: we went to the park and saw birds to play with .
there was a grand piano that people could play with .
there were lots of friends enjoying the outdoors .
there were lots of people playing music for us all .
some people even went crazy and ran wild .
output.sentences: The children went with their mother to the festival, where they found birds to dance with.
Mom and dad enjoyed playing the piano.
Others at the festival enjoyed sitting on the grass and reading.
Many people brought their own instrument to play, like a guitar or a tambourine.
Everyone had a great time, dancing and singing at the festival.
